When<S>5613</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> knew<S>1097</S> how<S>3754</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> had heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> made<S>4160</S> and<S>2532</S> baptized<S>907</S> more<S>4119</S> disciples<S>3101</S> than<S>2228</S> John<S>2491</S>,
(Though<S>2544</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> himself<S>846</S> baptized<S>907</S> not<S>3756</S>, but<S>235</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>,)
He left<S>863</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>, and<S>2532</S> departed<S>565</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he must needs<S>1163</S> go<S>1330</S> through<S>1223</S> Samaria<S>4540</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> cometh he<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> a city<S>4172</S> of Samaria<S>4540</S>, which is called<S>3004</S> Sychar<S>4965</S>, near<S>4139</S> to the parcel of ground<S>5564</S> that<S>3739</S> Jacob<S>2384</S> gave<S>1325</S> to his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S> Joseph<S>2501</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> Jacob's<S>2384</S> well<S>4077</S> was<S>2258</S> there<S>1563</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, being wearied<S>2872</S> with<S>1537</S> his journey<S>3597</S>, sat<S>2516</S> thus<S>3779</S> on<S>1909</S> the well<S>4077</S>: and it was<S>2258</S> about<S>5616</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> hour<S>5610</S>.
There cometh<S>2064</S> a woman<S>1135</S> of<S>1537</S> Samaria<S>4540</S> to draw<S>501</S> water<S>5204</S>: Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Give<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> to drink<S>4095</S>.
(For<S>1063</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> were gone away<S>565</S> unto<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S> to<S>2443</S> buy<S>59</S> meat<S>5160</S>.)
Then<S>3767</S> saith<S>3004</S> the woman<S>1135</S> of Samaria<S>4542</S> unto him<S>846</S>, How is it that<S>4459</S> thou<S>4771</S>, being<S>5607</S> a Jew<S>2453</S>, askest<S>154</S> drink<S>4095</S> of<S>3844</S> me<S>1700</S>, which am<S>5607</S> a woman<S>1135</S> of Samaria<S>4542</S>? for<S>1063</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> have<S>4798</S> no<S>3756</S> dealings<S>4798</S> with the Samaritans<S>4541</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> thou knewest<S>1492</S> the gift<S>1431</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> who<S>5101</S> it is<S>2076</S> that saith<S>3004</S> to thee<S>4671</S>, Give<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> to drink<S>4095</S>; thou<S>4771</S> wouldest<S>302</S> have asked<S>154</S> of him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he would<S>302</S> have given<S>1325</S> thee<S>4671</S> living<S>2198</S> water<S>5204</S>.
The woman<S>1135</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, thou hast<S>2192</S> nothing<S>3777</S> to draw with<S>502</S>, and<S>2532</S> the well<S>5421</S> is<S>2076</S> deep<S>901</S>: from whence<S>4159</S> then<S>3767</S> hast thou<S>2192</S> that living<S>2198</S> water<S>5204</S>?
<S>3361</S> Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> greater<S>3187</S> than our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S> Jacob<S>2384</S>, which<S>3739</S> gave<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S> the well<S>5421</S>, and<S>2532</S> drank<S>4095</S> thereof<S>1537</S> <S>846</S> himself<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> children<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> cattle<S>2353</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Whosoever<S>3956</S> drinketh<S>4095</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> water<S>5204</S> shall thirst<S>1372</S> again<S>3825</S>:
But<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> drinketh<S>4095</S> of<S>1537</S> the water<S>5204</S> that<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> shall give<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> shall<S>1372</S> never<S>1519</S> <S>165</S> <S>3364</S> thirst<S>1372</S>; but<S>235</S> the water<S>5204</S> that<S>3739</S> I shall give<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> shall be<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> a well<S>4077</S> of water<S>5204</S> springing up<S>242</S> into<S>1519</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
The woman<S>1135</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, give<S>1325</S> me<S>3427</S> this<S>5124</S> water<S>5204</S>, that<S>3363</S> I thirst<S>1372</S> not<S>3363</S>, neither<S>3366</S> come<S>2064</S> hither<S>1759</S> to draw<S>501</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Go<S>5217</S>, call<S>5455</S> thy<S>4675</S> husband<S>435</S>, and<S>2532</S> come<S>2064</S> hither<S>1759</S>.
The woman<S>1135</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, I have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> husband<S>435</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Thou hast<S>2036</S> well<S>2573</S> said<S>2036</S>,<S>3754</S> I have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> husband<S>435</S>:
For<S>1063</S> thou hast had<S>2192</S> five<S>4002</S> husbands<S>435</S>; and<S>2532</S> he whom<S>3739</S> thou<S>2192</S> now<S>3568</S> hast<S>2192</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> thy<S>4675</S> husband<S>435</S>: in that<S>5124</S> saidst thou<S>2046</S> truly<S>227</S>.
The woman<S>1135</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, I perceive<S>2334</S> that<S>3754</S> thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> a prophet<S>4396</S>.
Our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> mountain<S>3735</S>; and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> say<S>3004</S>, that<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> is<S>2076</S> the place<S>5117</S> where<S>3699</S> men ought<S>1163</S> to worship<S>4352</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S>, the hour<S>5610</S> cometh<S>3754</S> <S>2064</S>, when<S>3753</S> ye shall<S>4352</S> neither<S>3777</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> mountain<S>3735</S>, nor yet<S>3777</S> at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, worship<S>4352</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> worship<S>4352</S> ye know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> what<S>3739</S>: we know<S>1492</S> what<S>3739</S> we<S>2249</S> worship<S>4352</S>: for<S>3754</S> salvation<S>4991</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>.
But<S>235</S> the hour<S>5610</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> is<S>2076</S>, when<S>3753</S> the true<S>228</S> worshippers<S>4353</S> shall worship<S>4352</S> the Father<S>3962</S> in<S>1722</S> spirit<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> in truth<S>225</S>: for<S>2532</S> <S>1063</S> the Father<S>3962</S> seeketh<S>2212</S> such<S>5108</S> to worship<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>.
God<S>2316</S> is a Spirit<S>4151</S>: and<S>2532</S> they that worship<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S> must<S>1163</S> worship<S>4352</S> him in<S>1722</S> spirit<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> in truth<S>225</S>.
The woman<S>1135</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> Messias<S>3323</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, which<S>3588</S> is called<S>3004</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: when<S>3752</S> he<S>1565</S> is come<S>2064</S>, he will tell<S>312</S> us<S>2254</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> that speak<S>2980</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> am<S>1510</S> he.
And<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> this<S>5129</S> came<S>2064</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and<S>2532</S> marvelled<S>2296</S> that<S>3754</S> he talked<S>2980</S> with<S>3326</S> the woman<S>1135</S>: yet<S>3305</S> no man<S>3762</S> said<S>2036</S>, What<S>5101</S> seekest thou<S>2212</S>? or<S>2228</S>, Why<S>5101</S> talkest thou<S>2980</S> with<S>3326</S> her<S>846</S>?
The woman<S>1135</S> then<S>3767</S> left<S>863</S> her<S>846</S> waterpot<S>5201</S>, and<S>2532</S> went her way<S>565</S> into<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> to the men<S>444</S>,
Come<S>1205</S>, see<S>1492</S> a man<S>444</S>, which<S>3739</S> told<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S> all things<S>3956</S> that ever<S>3745</S> I did<S>4160</S>: is<S>2076</S> not<S>3385</S> this<S>3778</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>?
Then<S>3767</S> they went<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the city<S>4172</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>.
<S>1161</S> In<S>1722</S> the mean<S>3342</S> while his disciples<S>3101</S> prayed<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>4461</S>, eat<S>5315</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> have<S>2192</S> meat<S>1035</S> to eat<S>5315</S> that<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1492</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> one to another<S>4314</S> <S>240</S>, Hath<S>5342</S> any man<S>3387</S> brought<S>5342</S> him<S>846</S> ought to eat<S>5315</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, My<S>1699</S> meat<S>1033</S> is<S>2076</S> to<S>2443</S> do<S>4160</S> the will<S>2307</S> of him that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> to finish<S>5048</S> his<S>846</S> work<S>2041</S>.
Say<S>3004</S> not<S>3756</S> ye<S>5210</S>, There<S>3754</S> are<S>2076</S> yet<S>2089</S> four months<S>5072</S>, and<S>2532</S> then cometh<S>2064</S> harvest<S>2326</S>? behold<S>2400</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Lift up<S>1869</S> your<S>5216</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, and<S>2532</S> look on<S>2300</S> the fields<S>5561</S>; for<S>3754</S> they are<S>1526</S> white<S>3022</S> already<S>2235</S> to<S>4314</S> harvest<S>2326</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he that reapeth<S>2325</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> wages<S>3408</S>, and<S>2532</S> gathereth<S>4863</S> fruit<S>2590</S> unto<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S> eternal<S>166</S>: that<S>2443</S> both<S>2532</S> he that soweth<S>4687</S> and<S>2532</S> he that reapeth<S>2325</S> may rejoice<S>5463</S> together<S>3674</S>.
And<S>1063</S> herein<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> is<S>2076</S> that saying<S>3056</S> true<S>228</S>,<S>3754</S> One<S>243</S> soweth<S>2076</S> <S>4687</S>, and<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> reapeth<S>2325</S>.
I<S>1473</S> sent<S>649</S> you<S>5209</S> to reap<S>2325</S> that whereon<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> bestowed<S>2872</S> no<S>3756</S> labour<S>2872</S>: other men<S>243</S> laboured<S>2872</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> are entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> their<S>846</S> labours<S>2873</S>.
And<S>1161</S> many<S>4183</S> of the Samaritans<S>4541</S> of<S>1537</S> that<S>1565</S> city<S>4172</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> for<S>1223</S> the saying<S>3056</S> of the woman<S>1135</S>, which testified<S>3140</S>,<S>3754</S> He told<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S> all<S>3956</S> that ever<S>3745</S> I did<S>4160</S>.
So<S>3767</S> when<S>5613</S> the Samaritans<S>4541</S> were come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, they besought<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S> that he would tarry<S>3306</S> with<S>3844</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> he abode<S>3306</S> there<S>1563</S> two<S>1417</S> days<S>2250</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> more<S>4119</S> believed<S>4100</S> because<S>1223</S> of his own<S>846</S> word<S>3056</S>;
And<S>5037</S> said<S>3004</S> unto the woman<S>1135</S>,<S>3754</S> Now<S>3765</S> we believe<S>4100</S>, not<S>3754</S> because<S>1223</S> of thy<S>4674</S> saying<S>2981</S>: for<S>1063</S> we have heard<S>191</S> him ourselves<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> indeed<S>230</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>, the Saviour<S>4990</S> of the world<S>2889</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> after<S>3326</S> two<S>1417</S> days<S>2250</S> he departed<S>565</S> <S>1831</S> thence<S>1564</S>, and<S>2532</S> went into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>.
For<S>1063</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> himself<S>846</S> testified<S>3140</S>, that<S>3754</S> a prophet<S>4396</S> hath<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> honour<S>5092</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>2398</S> country<S>3968</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> when<S>3753</S> he was come<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, the Galilaeans<S>1057</S> received<S>1209</S> him<S>846</S>, having seen<S>3708</S> all the things<S>3956</S> that<S>3739</S> he did<S>4160</S> at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> at<S>1722</S> the feast<S>1859</S>: for<S>1063</S> they<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> went<S>2064</S> unto<S>1519</S> the feast<S>1859</S>.
So<S>3767</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> Cana<S>2580</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>, where<S>3699</S> he made<S>4160</S> the water<S>5204</S> wine<S>3631</S>. And<S>2532</S> there was<S>2258</S> a certain<S>5100</S> nobleman<S>937</S>, whose<S>3739</S> son<S>5207</S> was sick<S>770</S> at<S>1722</S> Capernaum<S>2584</S>. <sup>nobleman: or, courtier, or, ruler</sup>
When he<S>3778</S> heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> was come<S>2240</S> out of<S>1537</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, he went<S>565</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> besought<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S> that<S>2443</S> he would come down<S>2597</S>, and<S>2532</S> heal<S>2390</S> his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S>: for<S>1063</S> he was at the point<S>3195</S> of death<S>599</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Except<S>3362</S> ye see<S>1492</S> signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>, ye will<S>4100</S> not<S>3364</S> believe<S>4100</S>.
The nobleman<S>937</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, come down<S>2597</S> ere<S>4250</S> my<S>3450</S> child<S>3813</S> die<S>599</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Go thy way<S>4198</S>; thy<S>4675</S> son<S>5207</S> liveth<S>2198</S>. And<S>2532</S> the man<S>444</S> believed<S>4100</S> the word<S>3056</S> that<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had spoken<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he went his way<S>4198</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as he<S>846</S> was now<S>2235</S> going down<S>2597</S>, his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S> met<S>528</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> told<S>518</S> him, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> Thy<S>4675</S> son<S>3816</S> liveth<S>2198</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> enquired he<S>4441</S> of<S>3844</S> them<S>846</S> the hour<S>5610</S> when<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> he began<S>2192</S> to amend<S>2866</S>. And<S>2532</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> Yesterday<S>5504</S> at the seventh<S>1442</S> hour<S>5610</S> the fever<S>4446</S> left<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>.
So<S>3767</S> the father<S>3962</S> knew<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> it was at<S>1722</S> the same<S>1565</S> hour<S>5610</S>, in<S>1722</S> the which<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> Thy<S>4675</S> son<S>5207</S> liveth<S>2198</S>: and<S>2532</S> himself<S>846</S> believed<S>4100</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> whole<S>3650</S> house<S>3614</S>.
This<S>5124</S> is again<S>3825</S> the second<S>1208</S> miracle<S>4592</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> did<S>4160</S>, when he was come out<S>2064</S> of<S>1537</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>.
